get.description: List the operations for the provider

get.description: Gets the properties of the specified key-value. NOTE: This operation is intended for use in ARM Template deployments. For all other scenarios involving App Configuration key-values the data plane API should be used instead.

parameters.name: configStoreName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration store.

parameters.name: keyValueName
parameters.description: Identifier of key and label combination. Key and label are joined by $ character. Label is optional.

put.description: Creates a key-value. NOTE: This operation is intended for use in ARM Template deployments. For all other scenarios involving App Configuration key-values the data plane API should be used instead.

parameters.name: configStoreName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration store.

parameters.name: keyValueName
parameters.description: Identifier of key and label combination. Key and label are joined by $ character. Label is optional.

parameters.name: keyValueParameters
parameters.description: The parameters for creating a key-value.

delete.description: Deletes a key-value. NOTE: This operation is intended for use in ARM Template deployments. For all other scenarios involving App Configuration key-values the data plane API should be used instead.

ActionsRequired.description: Any action that is required beyond basic workflow (approve/ reject/ disconnect)

ApiKey.description: An API key used for authenticating with a configuration store endpoint.

name.description: A name for the key describing its usage.

value.description: The value of the key that is used for authentication purposes.

connectionString.description: A connection string that can be used by supporting clients for authentication.

lastModified.description: The last time any of the key's properties were modified.

readOnly.description: Whether this key can only be used for read operations.

ApiKeyListResult.description: The result of a request to list API keys.

value.description: The ApiKey items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

AuthenticationMode.description: The data plane proxy authentication mode. This property manages the authentication mode of request to the data plane resources.

values.name: Local
values.description: The local authentication mode. Users are not required to have data plane permissions if local authentication is not disabled.

values.name: Pass-through
values.description: The pass-through authentication mode. User identity will be passed through from ARM, requiring user to have data plane action permissions (Available via App Configuration Data Owner/ App Configuration Data Reader).

CheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters used for checking whether a resource name is available.

name.description: The name to check for availability.

type.description: The resource type to check for name availability.

CompositionType.description: The composition type describes how the key-values within the snapshot are composed. The 'key' composition type ensures there are no two key-values containing the same key. The 'key_label' composition type ensures there are no two key-values containing the same key and label.

ConfigurationResourceType.description: The resource type to check for name availability.

ConfigurationStore.description: The configuration store along with all resource properties. The Configuration Store will have all information to begin utilizing it.

properties.description: The properties of a configuration store.

identity.description: The managed identity information, if configured.

sku.description: The sku of the configuration store.

ConfigurationStoreListResult.description: The response of a ConfigurationStore list operation.

value.description: The ConfigurationStore items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ConfigurationStoreProperties.description: The properties of a configuration store.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the configuration store.

creationDate.description: The creation date of configuration store.

endpoint.description: The DNS endpoint where the configuration store API will be available.

encryption.description: The encryption settings of the configuration store.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The list of private endpoint connections that are set up for this resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks while private endpoint is enabled.

disableLocalAuth.description: Disables all authentication methods other than AAD authentication.

softDeleteRetentionInDays.description: The amount of time in days that the configuration store will be retained when it is soft deleted.

defaultKeyValueRevisionRetentionPeriodIn.description: The duration in seconds to retain new key value revisions. Defaults to 604800 (7 days) for Free SKU stores and 2592000 (30 days) for Standard SKU stores and Premium SKU stores.

enablePurgeProtection.description: Property specifying whether protection against purge is enabled for this configuration store.

dataPlaneProxy.description: Property specifying the configuration of data plane proxy for Azure Resource Manager (ARM).

createMode.description: Indicates whether the configuration store need to be recovered.

telemetry.description: Property specifying the configuration of telemetry for this configuration store

ConfigurationStorePropertiesUpdateParame.description: The properties for updating a configuration store.

encryption.description: The encryption settings of the configuration store.

disableLocalAuth.description: Disables all authentication methods other than AAD authentication.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks while private endpoint is enabled.

enablePurgeProtection.description: Property specifying whether protection against purge is enabled for this configuration store.

dataPlaneProxy.description: Property specifying the configuration of data plane proxy for Azure Resource Manager (ARM).

defaultKeyValueRevisionRetentionPeriodIn.description: The duration in seconds to retain new key value revisions. Defaults to 604800 (7 days) for Free SKU stores and 2592000 (30 days) for Standard SKU stores and Premium SKU stores.

telemetry.description: Property specifying the configuration of telemetry to update for this configuration store

ConfigurationStoreUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a configuration store.

properties.description: The properties for updating a configuration store.

identity.description: The managed identity information for the configuration store.

sku.description: The SKU of the configuration store.

ConnectionStatus.description: The private link service connection status.

CreateMode.description: Indicates whether the configuration store need to be recovered.

DataPlaneProxyProperties.description: The data plane proxy settings for a configuration store.

authenticationMode.description: The data plane proxy authentication mode. This property manages the authentication mode of request to the data plane resources.

privateLinkDelegation.description: The data plane proxy private link delegation. This property manages if a request from delegated ARM private link is allowed when the data plane resource requires private link.

DeletedConfigurationStore.description: Deleted configuration store information with extended details.

properties.description: Properties of the deleted configuration store

DeletedConfigurationStoreListResult.description: The response of a DeletedConfigurationStore list operation.

value.description: The DeletedConfigurationStore items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DeletedConfigurationStoreProperties.description: Properties of the deleted configuration store.

configurationStoreId.description: The resource id of the original configuration store.

location.description: The location of the original configuration store.

tags.description: Tags of the original configuration store.

purgeProtectionEnabled.description: Purge protection status of the original configuration store.

EncryptionProperties.description: The encryption settings for a configuration store.

IdentityType.description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities.

KeyValue.description: The key-value resource along with all resource properties.

key.description: Filters key-values by their key field.

label.description: Filters key-values by their label field.

key.description:
The primary identifier of a key-value.
The key is used in unison with the label to uniquely identify a key-value.

label.description:
A value used to group key-values.
The label is used in unison with the key to uniquely identify a key-value.

contentType.description:
The content type of the key-value's value.
Providing a proper content-type can enable transformations of values when they are retrieved by applications.

eTag.description: An ETag indicating the state of a key-value within a configuration store.

lastModified.description: The last time a modifying operation was performed on the given key-value.

locked.description:
A value indicating whether the key-value is locked.
A locked key-value may not be modified until it is unlocked.

tags.description: A dictionary of tags that can help identify what a key-value may be applicable for.

KeyVaultProperties.description: Settings concerning key vault encryption for a configuration store.

keyIdentifier.description: The URI of the key vault key used to encrypt data.

identityClientId.description: The client id of the identity which will be used to access key vault.

LogSpecification.description: Specifications of the Log for Azure Monitoring

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the log

MetricDimension.description: Specifications of the Dimension of metrics

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the dimension

MetricSpecification.description: Specifications of the Metrics for Azure Monitoring

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the metric

displayDescription.description: Localized friendly description of the metric

unit.description: Unit that makes sense for the metric

aggregationType.description: Only provide one value for this field. Valid values: Average, Minimum, Maximum, Total, Count.

fillGapWithZero.description: Optional. If set to true, then zero will be returned for time duration where no metric is emitted/published.

NameAvailabilityStatus.description: The result of a request to check the availability of a resource name.

nameAvailable.description: The value indicating whether the resource name is available.

message.description: If any, the error message that provides more detail for the reason that the name is not available.

reason.description: If any, the reason that the name is not available.

OperationDefinition.description: The definition of a configuration store operation.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

display.description: The display information for the configuration store operation.

OperationDefinitionDisplay.description: The display information for a configuration store operation.

provider.description: The resource provider name: Microsoft App Configuration."

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next set of paged results.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the private endpoint connection.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

PrivateEndpointConnectionReference.description: A reference to a related private endpoint connection.

properties.description: The properties of a private endpoint connection.

PrivateLinkDelegation.description: The data plane proxy private link delegation. This property manages if a request from delegated ARM private link is allowed when the data plane resource requires private link.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: ARM private endpoint is required if the resource requires private link.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Request is denied if the resource requires private link.

value.description: The PrivateLinkResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

groupId.description: The private link resource group id.

requiredMembers.description: The private link resource required member names.

requiredZoneNames.description: The list of required DNS zone names of the private link resource.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: The state of a private link service connection.

status.description: The private link service connection status.

description.description: The private link service connection description.

actionsRequired.description: Any action that is required beyond basic workflow (approve/ reject/ disconnect)

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the configuration store.

PublicNetworkAccess.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks.

values.name: Enabled
values.description: Allow public network access to the data plane.

values.name: Disabled
values.description: Disallow public network access to the data plane.

RegenerateKeyParameters.description: The parameters used to regenerate an API key.

id.description: The id of the key to regenerate.

value.description: The Replica items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

endpoint.description: The URI of the replica where the replica API will be available.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the replica.

ReplicaProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the replica.

ResourceIdentity.description: An identity that can be associated with a resource.

type.description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identities.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned identities associated with the resource. The user-assigned identity dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

principalId.description: The principal id of the identity. This property will only be provided for a system-assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant id associated with the resource's identity. This property will only be provided for a system-assigned identity.

logSpecifications.description: Specifications of the Log for Azure Monitoring

metricSpecifications.description: Specifications of the Metrics for Azure Monitoring

name.description: The SKU name of the configuration store.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the snapshot.

status.description: The current status of the snapshot.

filters.description: A list of filters used to filter the key-values included in the snapshot.

compositionType.description: The composition type describes how the key-values within the snapshot are composed. The 'key' composition type ensures there are no two key-values containing the same key. The 'key_label' composition type ensures there are no two key-values containing the same key and label.

created.description: The time that the snapshot was created.

expires.description: The time that the snapshot will expire.

retentionPeriod.description: The amount of time, in seconds, that a snapshot will remain in the archived state before expiring. This property is only writable during the creation of a snapshot. If not specified, the default lifetime of key-value revisions will be used.

size.description: The size in bytes of the snapshot.

itemsCount.description: The amount of key-values in the snapshot.

tags.description: The tags of the snapshot. NOTE: These are data plane tags, not ARM tags.

etag.description: A value representing the current state of the snapshot.

SnapshotStatus.description: The current status of the snapshot.

resourceId.description: Resource ID of a resource enabling telemetry collection

UserIdentity.description: A resource identity that is managed by the user of the service.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the user-assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client ID of the user-assigned identity.
